mapper.select: select c.id applyId,r.id resumeId,userId,resumeName,resumeHeadImg,userLoginId,resumeGender,resumeGraduationSchool,resumeWages,resumeMajor,resumePhone from companyResume c,resume r,user u where u.id=r.userId and c.cmpRecId=#{cmpRecId} and c.resumeId=r.id and cmprStatus=2
select * from companyResume c,resume r where r.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update companyResume set cmprAction=#{cmprAction} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from education where resumeId=#{resumeId} and not resumeType=4
select * from work where resumeId=#{resumeId} and not resumeType=4
select * from project where resumeId=#{resumeId} and not resumeType=4
select count(*) from companyresume where cmpRecId=#{recruitId} and resumeId=#{resumeId}
